subject: Football
Brain
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: Shawn Mitchell, the San Diego Chargers’ chaplain, said on Thursday that Junior Seau’s family would allow his brain to be examined by researchers who study head trauma.
snippet: Shawn Mitchell, the San Diego Chargers’ chaplain, said on Thursday that Junior Seau’s family would allow his brain to be examined by researchers who study head trauma.
